scripts.build:site: sass --style=compressed --no-source-map src/assets/scss/main.scss dist/assets/css/main.css && node scripts/build-site.js && mkdir -p dist/assets/webfonts dist/assets/fonts/Plus_Jakarta_Sans dist/assets/fonts/Manrope && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* dist/assets/webfonts/ && cp src/assets/fonts/Plus_Jakarta_Sans/*.woff2 dist/assets/fonts/Plus_Jakarta_Sans/ && cp src/assets/fonts/Manrope/*.woff2 dist/assets/fonts/Manrope/ && npm run clean:dist
